TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SocketAsyncEventArgs extends System.EventArgs implements class System.IDisposable
Public Class SocketAsyncEventArgs Inherits EventArgs Implements IDisposable
public ref class SocketAsyncEventArgs : EventArgs, IDisposable
type SocketAsyncEventArgs = class inherit EventArgs interface IDisposable

summary.span: 表示异步套接字操作。

span.span: Represents an asynchronous socket operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是类的一组增强功能的一部分，这些增强功能提供了一 种可供专用高性能套接字应用程序使用的替代异步模式。The class is part of a set of enhancements to the class that provide an alternative asynchronous pattern that can be used by specialized high-performance socket applications. 此类专为需要高性能的网络服务器应用程序而设计。This class was specifically designed for network server applications that require high performance. 应用程序可以独占方式使用增强的异步模式，也可以仅在目标热区中使用 (例如，在接收大量数据) 时使用。An application can use the enhanced asynchronous pattern exclusively or only in targeted hot areas (for example, when receiving large amounts of data). 这些增强功能的主要功能是避免在大容量异步套接字 I/O 期间重复分配和同步对象。The main feature of these enhancements is the avoidance of the repeated allocation and synchronization of objects during high-volume asynchronous socket I/O. 当前由类实现的开始/结束设计模式 需要为 每个异步套接字操作分配一个对象。The Begin/End design pattern currently implemented by the class requires a object be allocated for each asynchronous socket operation. 在新的 类增强功能中，异步套接字操作由 应用程序分配和维护的可重用对象进行描述。In the new class enhancements, asynchronous socket operations are described by reusable objects allocated and maintained by the application. 高性能套接字应用程序非常清楚必须维持的重叠套接字操作的数量。High-performance socket applications know best the amount of overlapped socket operations that must be sustained. 该应用程序可创建所需的 对象数量。The application can create as many of the objects that it needs. 例如，如果服务器应用程序在任何时候都需要有15个套接字接受操作来支持传入的客户端连接速率，则它可以分配15个可重复使用 的对象来实现此目的。For example, if a server application needs to have 15 socket accept operations outstanding at all times to support incoming client connection rates, it can allocate 15 reusable objects for that purpose. 使用此类执行异步套接字操作的模式包括以下步骤：The pattern for performing an asynchronous socket operation with this class consists of the following steps: 1. 分配一个新的 上下文对象，或从应用程序池中获取一个空闲对象。Allocate a new context object, or get a free one from an application pool. 2. 将上下文对象的属性设置为要执行的操作， (完成回调方法、数据缓冲区、缓冲区中的偏移量和要传输的最大数据量，例如) 。Set properties on the context object to the operation about to be performed (the completion callback method, the data buffer, the offset into the buffer, and the maximum amount of data to transfer, for example). 3. 调用适当的套接字方法 (xxxAsync) 以启动异步操作。Call the appropriate socket method (xxxAsync) to initiate the asynchronous operation. 4. 如果 (xxxAsync) 的异步套接字方法返回 true，则在回调中查询上下文属性的完成状态。If the asynchronous socket method (xxxAsync) returns true, in the callback, query the context properties for completion status. 5. 如果 (xxxAsync) 的异步套接字方法返回 false，则操作同步完成。If the asynchronous socket method (xxxAsync) returns false, the operation completed synchronously. 可查询上下文属性获取操作结果。The context properties may be queried for the operation result. 6. 重新使用上下文进行另一项操作，将其放回池中，或放弃它。Reuse the context for another operation, put it back in the pool, or discard it. 新的异步套接字操作上下文对象的生存期由应用程序代码和异步 i/o 引用的引用确定。The lifetime of the new asynchronous socket operation context object is determined by references by the application code and asynchronous I/O references. 作为参数提交给异步套接字操作方法之一后，应用程序不必保留对异步套接字操作上下文对象的引用。It is not necessary for the application to retain a reference to an asynchronous socket operation context object after it is submitted as a parameter to one of the asynchronous socket operation methods. 完成回调返回之前，应用程序会继续引用它。It will remain referenced until the completion callback returns. 但是，应用程序保留对上下文的引用是有利的，以便以后可以重复使用它进行异步套接字操作。However it is advantageous for the application to retain the reference to the context so that it can be reused for a future asynchronous socket operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现使用类的套接字服务器的连接逻辑 。The following code example implements the connection logic for the socket server that uses the class. 接受连接后，从客户端读取的所有数据都将发送回客户端。After accepting a connection, all data read from the client is sent back to the client. 读取和回显到客户端模式将继续，直到客户端断开连接。The read and echo back to the client pattern is continued until the client disconnects. 此示例使用的 BufferManager 类显示在方法的代码示例中 。The BufferManager class that is used by this example is displayed in the code example for the method. 在此示例中使用的 SocketAsyncEventArgsPool 类显示在构造函数的代码示例中 。The SocketAsyncEventArgsPool class that is used in this example is displayed in the code example for the constructor. [!code-csharp[NCLAsyncSocketServer#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLAsyncSocketServer/CS/AsyncSocketServer.cs#3)]

span.span: Network Programming in the .NET Framework
Network Tracing in the .NET Framework

summary.span: 获取或设置要使用的套接字或创建用于接受与异步套接字方法的连接的套接字。

span.span: Gets or sets the socket to use or the socket created for accepting a connection with an asynchronous socket method.

value.span: 要使用的 或者创建用于接受与异步套接字方法的连接的套接字。

span.span: The to use or the socket created for accepting a connection with an asynchronous socket method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于提供已创建 的，它将用于异步套接字接受操作。This property can be used to provide an already created that will be used for an asynchronous socket accept operation. 在接受操作完成后，它是表示接受的连接的套接字。Upon completion of the accept operation, it is the socket representing the accepted connection. 如果在调用方法之前未提供 (设置为 null) ，则将自动创建一个新的套接字，并使用此属性在完成回调中访问它。If not supplied (set to null) before calling the method, a new socket will be created automatically and be accessible in the completion callback with this property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个要用于异步套接字方法的数据缓冲区数组。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of data buffers to use with an asynchronous socket method.

value.span: 一个 ，表示要用于异步套接字方法的数据缓冲区数组。

span.span: An that represents an array of data buffers to use with an asynchronous socket method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与 和方法一起使用 。This property is used with the and methods. 此属性用于提供要发送的多个数据缓冲区，或者提供多个缓冲区，以便在其中存储可以发送或接收数据的异步套接字操作的接收数据。This property is used to provide multiple buffers of data to be sent or to provide multiple buffers in which to store received data for an asynchronous socket operation that can send or receive data. 和方法支持使用属性的多个缓冲区 。Multiple buffers using the property are supported by the and methods. 如果该 属性设置为非 null 值，则该 属性必须为 null，并且将被 和 方法忽略。If the property is set to a non-null value, the property must be null and is ignored by the and methods. 如果 设置为非 null 值，并且尝试将该 属性设置为非 null 值，则会引发异常。If the was set to a non-null value and an attempt is made to set the property to a non-null value, an exception is thrown. 如果将 属性设置为非 null 值，则 和 方法将引发 。If the property is set to a non-null value, the and methods will throw an . 和方法会忽略该参数 。The parameter is ignored by the and methods.

exception.span: 存在不明确的缓冲区，这些缓冲区是在 set 操作上指定的。

span.span: There are ambiguous buffers specified on a set operation.

exception.span: 如果 属性已设置为非空值并且尝试将 属性设置为非空值，将引发此异常。

span.span: This exception occurs if the property has been set to a non-null value and an attempt was made to set the property to a non-null value.

summary.span: 获取在套接字操作中传输的字节数。

span.span: Gets the number of bytes transferred in the socket operation.

value.span: 一个 ，包含在套接字操作中传输的字节数。

span.span: An that contains the number of bytes transferred in the socket operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性提供可接收或发送数据的异步套接字操作中传输的字节数。This property provides the number of bytes transferred in an asynchronous socket operation that can receive or send data. 如果从读取操作返回零，则远程端已关闭连接。If zero is returned from a read operation, the remote end has closed the connection. 此属性由除方法之外的所有异步套接字操作设置 。This property is set by all asynchronous socket operations except the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Completed As EventHandler(Of SocketAsyncEventArgs)

summary.span: 用于完成异步操作的事件。

span.span: The event used to complete an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件为客户端应用程序提供了一种完成异步套接字操作的方法。The event provides a way for client applications to complete an asynchronous socket operation. 当异步套接字操作启动时，事件处理程序应附加到实例中的事件，否则应用程序将无法确定操作完成的时间。An event handler should be attached to the event within a instance when an asynchronous socket operation is initiated, otherwise the application will not be able to determine when the operation completes. 事件引用的完成回调委托 包含处理客户端的异步套接字操作的程序逻辑。The completion callback delegates referenced by the event contains program logic to finish processing the asynchronous socket operation for the client. 当事件收到信号时，应用程序将使用 object 参数获取已完成的异步套接字操作的状态。When the event is signaled, the application uses the object parameter to obtain the status of the completed asynchronous socket operation.

summary.span: 当使用 时，在出现连接故障的情况下获取异常。

span.span: Gets the exception in the case of a connection failure when a was used.

value.span: 一个 ，指示在为 属性指定 时发生连接错误的原因。

span.span: An that indicates the cause of the connection error when a was specified for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在为属性指定了时连接失败 ，则该 属性将包含指示套接字错误的详细原因的异常。In the case of a connection failure when a was specified for the property, the property will contain the exception that indicates the detailed cause of the socket error. 如果为 属性指定了 并发生连接失败，则该 属性将是 `null` 引用。When an was specified for the property and a connection failure occurs, the property will be a `null` reference. 在连接失败的情况下，始终设置属性。The property is always set in the case of a connection failure. 如果连接到失败，属性包含有关失败的详细信息 。The property contains more information about the failure if it was a failure connecting to a . 如果应用程序只对连接操作是否成功或失败感兴趣，则应用程序只需检查 属性。If an application is only interested in whether the connect operation succeeded or failed, then the application only needs to check the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定套接字能否在断开操作之后重用。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies if socket can be reused after a disconnect operation.

value.span: 一个 ，指定套接字能否在断开操作之后重用。

span.span: A that specifies if socket can be reused after a disconnect operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于更改方法的行为 。This property is used to alter the behavior of method. 如果为 true，则 在后续套接字接受或连接操作完成后，可以重新使用通过方法断开连接的套接字。If true, a socket disconnected by the method can be reused after disconnect completion in subsequent socket accept or connect operations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由 实例使用的非托管资源，并可选择释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the instance and optionally disposes of the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true` 。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Dispose`在设置为的情况调用 `disposing` `false` 。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/network-tracing)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/network-tracing).

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取最近使用此上下文对象执行的套接字操作类型。

span.span: Gets the type of socket operation most recently performed with this context object.

value.span: 一个 实例，指示最近使用此上下文对象执行的套接字操作类型。

span.span: A instance that indicates the type of socket operation most recently performed with this context object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性描述使用此对象最近完成的异步套接字操作 。This property describes the asynchronous socket operation that was most recently completed using this object. 此属性的值将一直为 ，直到 使用实例开始异步套接字操作。The value of this property will be until the instance is used to begin an asynchronous socket operation. 然后，将属性设置为采用作为参数的方法中所执行的操作的类型 。The property will then be set to the type of operation being performed in the methods that take the as a parameter. 此属性更便于使用单个完成回调委托实现多种类型的异步套接字操作。This property more easily facilitates using a single completion callback delegate for multiple kinds of asynchronous socket operations. 此属性在实例中保持有效， 直到将该 实例用于另一个异步套接字 (xxxAsync) 操作。This property remains valid in a instance until the instance is used for another asynchronous socket (xxxAsync) operation. 此属性由所有异步套接字 (xxxAsync) 方法设置。This property is set by all asynchronous socket (xxxAsync) methods. 调用异步套接字方法 (类上的 xxxAsync) 设置此属性值。Calling an asynchronous socket method (xxxAsync) on the class sets this property value. 此属性用于与应用程序实现的 SocketAsyncCallback 完成例程一起使用。This property is intended for use with the SocketAsyncCallback completion routine implemented by the application.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnCompleted(class System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs e) cil managed

abstract member OnCompleted : System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs -> unit override this.OnCompleted : System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs -> unit

span.span: The event that is signaled.

summary.span: 表示异步操作完成时调用的方法。

span.span: Represents a method that is called when an asynchronous operation completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户代码无法调用此方法。This method is not callable by user code. 当当前操作完成时，对象的内部机制将调用此方法 。This method gets called by the internals of the object when the current operation is complete. 此方法与所有异步套接字 (xxxAsync) 方法一起使用。This method is used with all asynchronous socket (xxxAsync) methods. 创建从继承的类的应用程序 可以重写此方法以挂钩到此完成通知，并清理它为操作分配的任何资源。An application that creates a class inheriting from can override this method to hook into this completion notification and clean up any resources that it allocated for the operation. 默认实现仅引发 事件。The default implementation just raises the event. 此方法用于挂钩要用作后续异步套接字操作的完成回调的事件处理程序。This method is used to hook up an event handler to be used as the completion callback for a subsequent asynchronous socket operation. 调用方必须在启动异步套接字操作之前，使用该类上的一个异步 (xxxAsync) 方法来实现此方法中至少一个继承委托 。The caller must implement at least one callback delegate inherited from this method prior to starting an asynchronous socket operation using one of the asynchronous (xxxAsync) methods on the class. 调用方的 方法提供了一种方法，使客户端应用程序能够完成异步套接字操作。The caller's method provides a way for client applications to complete an asynchronous socket operation. 启动异步套接字操作时必须实现回调委托。A callback delegate must be implemented when an asynchronous socket operation is initiated. 派生自方法) 的完成回调 (委托 必须包含用于完成客户端的异步套接字操作处理的程序逻辑。The completion callback delegate(s) inherited from the method must contain program logic to finish processing the asynchronous socket operation for the client. 当异步操作收到信号时，应用程序将使用 object 参数获取已完成的异步套接字操作的状态。When an asynchronous operation is signaled, the application uses the object parameter to obtain status of the completed asynchronous socket operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定远程终结点。This property specifies the remote endpoint. 此属性可使用方法指定要连接到的远程终结点 。This property can specify the remote endpoint to which to connect using the method. 此属性可使用方法指定要向其发送数据的远程终结点 。This property can specify the remote endpoint to which to send data using method. 此属性可以指定使用或方法从中接收数据的远程终结点 。This property can specify the remote endpoint from which data was received using the or methods. 此属性指定的远程终结点可以包括 IPv4 或 IPv6 地址。This remote endpoint specified by this property can include an IPv4 or IPv6 address. 此属性用于 、 、 或 方法。This property is used with the , , , or methods.

summary.span: 获取或设置发送操作中使用的数据块的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the data block used in the send operation.

value.span: 一个 ，包含在发送操作中使用的数据块的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: An that contains the size, in bytes, of the data block used in the send operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为零，使套接字层选择默认发送大小。Set this property to zero to let the sockets layer select a default send size. 如果将此属性设置为0xFFFFFFFF，则调用方可以通过使用属性来控制每个发送请求的大小和内容 。Setting this property to 0xFFFFFFFF enables the caller to control the size and content of each send request, achieved by using the property. 此功能适用于对各个发送请求的大小施加限制的消息协议。This capability is useful for message protocols that place limitations on the size of individual send requests.

summary.span: 设置要用于异步套接字方法的数据缓冲区。

span.span: Sets the data buffer to use with an asynchronous socket method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `offset`和 `count` 参数不能为负数。The `offset` and `count` parameters can't be negative numbers. 和参数的组合 `offset` `count` 必须位于属性中的缓冲区数组的边界内 。The combination of the `offset` and `count` parameters must be in bounds of the buffer array in the property. 此方法将 属性设置为 `count` 参数，将属性设置 为 `offset` 参数。This method sets the property to the `count` parameter and the property to the `offset` parameter. 如果 属性为 null，则此方法将忽略 `offset` 和 `count` 参数，并将 和 属性设置为0。If the property is null, this method ignores the `offset` and `count` parameters and sets the and properties to 0. 此方法不会更改 属性。This method does not change the property.

span.span: An argument was out of range.

exception.span: 如果 参数小于零或大于 属性中的数组长度，将发生此异常。

span.span: This exception occurs if the parameter is less than zero or greater than the length of the array in the property.

exception.span: 如果 参数小于零或大于 属性中的数组长度减去 参数的值，也会发生此异常。

span.span: This exception also occurs if the parameter is less than zero or greater than the length of the array in the property minus the parameter.

summary.span: 设置要用于异步套接字方法的数据缓冲区。

span.span: Sets the data buffer to use with an asynchronous socket method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `offset`和 `count` 参数不能为负数。The `offset` and `count` parameters can't be negative numbers. 和参数的组合 `offset` `count` 必须在参数中的数据数组边界内 `buffer` 。The combination of the `offset` and `count` parameters must be in bounds of the data array in the `buffer` parameter. 此方法将 属性设置为参数，将属性设置为参数 `buffer` ，并将属性设置为 `count` `offset` 参数。This method sets the property to the `buffer` parameter, the property to the `count` parameter, and the property to the `offset` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个大缓冲区，该缓冲区可被分割并分配到 对象，以便与每个套接字 i/o 操作一起使用。The following code example creates a single large buffer which can be divided up and assigned to objects for use with each socket I/O operation. 这使得可以轻松地重复使用缓冲区，并防止分段堆内存。This enables buffers to be easily reused and guards against fragmenting heap memory. [!code-csharp[NCLAsyncSocketServer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLAsyncSocketServer/CS/AsyncSocketServer.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以使用此属性将应用程序状态对象与对象相关联 。This property can be used by an application to associate an application state object with the object. 此属性主要用于向应用程序传递状态到应用程序的事件处理程序 (例如，异步操作完成方法) 。Primarily, this property is a way for an application to pass state to the application's event handler (for example, the asynchronous operation completion method). 此属性与所有异步套接字 (xxxAsync) 方法一起使用。This property is used with all of the asynchronous socket (xxxAsync) methods.
